name: Jeffy's Law of Math with Cheerios Boxes
name_original: Jeffy's Law of Math with Cheerios Boxes
description:
Jeffy's Law of Math with Cheerios Boxes is an educational game developed by AhmedFareed23. It was originally released in 2020.
Jeffy's Law of Math with Cheerios Boxes is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
